achievement.double_trouble.description: Use a Punchton to push an enemy in front of another Punchton.
achievement.double_trouble.name: Double Trouble
achievement.ghost_buster.description: Kill a ghost without illuminating it once
achievement.ghost_buster.name: Ghost Buster
achievement.return_to_sender.description: Defeat a ghast using a fireball.
achievement.return_to_sender.name: Return to Sender
achievement.rickroll_drown.description: Make a zombie without a boat drown.
achievement.rickroll_drown.name: Never gonna let you drown
advice.collect_money.1: Collect gems to purchase COOL stuff!
advice.place_on_statue: You cannot place contraptions on statues
advice.starshard_tutorial.0: Click the Starshard to select it!
advice.starshard_tutorial.5: Now defeat the Iron Helmet Zombie!
advice.trigger_tutorial.1: Click the ME Panel to select Trigger!
advice.trigger_tutorial.6: Place TNT, then it will be instantly triggered!
advice.trigger_tutorial.8: Instant triggering can only be used on single-use contraptions.
advice.trigger_tutorial.9: You can swap these two actions in Settings.
advice.tutorial.0: Click a blueprint to choose a contraption!
advice.tutorial.1: Click the lawn to place a contraption!
advice.tutorial.13: Mine TNTs can blow up enemies after arming itself!
advice.tutorial.14: Blow up the Iron Helmet Zombie with Mine TNT!
advice.tutorial.16: Finally, the pickaxe can dig out placed contraptions!
advice.tutorial.17: Try to dig out all contraptions!
advice.tutorial.3: Click redstone to collect ME (Mechanical Energy)!
advice.tutorial.4: Collect enough ME to place contraptions!
advice.tutorial.5: Defeat the zombie with your Dispenser!
advice.tutorial.8: Furnaces can provide you additional redstone!
advice.tutorial.9: The more Furnaces you have, the faster you can build!
archive.goto_dream: (Steve and Villager goes to the Dream World.)
archive.money_insufficent: If you don't have enough money
blueprint.add_pearl.name: Add Ball
blueprint.lengthen_board.name: Lengthen Board
blueprint.return_pearl.name: Return Ball
boss.frankenstein.name: Frankenstein
character.crazy_villager.description:
Steve's caregiver since he was young, suddenly went crazy a few years ago and couldn't be understood.
Often discussed with Steve about Gensokyo, and finally embarked on their journey today.
character.crazy_villager.description_hea: A crazy villager in a white outfit who lives together with Steve. His name is Ahmed Dave.
character.crazy_villager.name: Villager
character.doremy.description:
A baku who administers the Dream World, has the ability to observe, change and consume others' dreams.
Was shocked by Steve and Villager who arrived in their physical bodies, but she seems to have seen some interesting dreams from Steve.
character.doremy.description_header: Doremy Sweet is the administrator of the Dream World, and manages everyone's dreams.
character.doremy.name: Doremy
character.orant.description:
She doesn't want you to know things about her - she has always been introversive.
Just keep in mind that she is a friend of souls and fear.
character.orant.description_header: Orant is a soul sorceress, can manipulate fear and souls.
character.orant.name: Orant
character.steve.name: Steve
chat.dream.1.0.1: This is Doremy's territory. Be careful not to run into wild bakus!
chat.dream.1.0.2: Also, it's daytime here, so some of your contraptions can't be used!
chat.dream.1.0.3: For example, Small Dispensers, Moonlight Sensors, even Soul Furnaces!
chat.dream.1.0.4: Also, there's a pool here, but don't even think about swimming! You can't place contraptions on the water!
chat.dream.1.name: Dream World Day 1 Intro
chat.dream.11.0.0: Okay, the Nightmare will be here soon.
chat.dream.11.0.2: I don't know what Nightmare is, nor what it can do. But, I do know that you must stay clear-headed.
chat.dream.11.0.3: Our time is running out. We must finish the battle as soon as possible.
chat.dream.11.name: Dream World Day 11 Intro
chat.dream.2.0.0: So... you came here using a key, and you want to enter Gensokyo, correct?
chat.dream.2.0.1: I would let you through, but there's kind of a problem.
chat.dream.2.0.3: Due to the invasion of those blocky bugs, the Dream World isn't exactly stable.
chat.dream.2.0.4: Get rid of those bugs, and you'll reach Gensokyo without any trouble.
chat.dream.2.0.5: Pest control? My friend is the best insecticide you could ever wish for! Let's Rock!
chat.dream.2.name: Dream World Day 2 Intro
chat.dream.3.0.0: Have you noticed how the sky suddenly turns dark? Though it's only for a little while.
chat.dream.3.0.2: But, as long as we have light, no amount of darkness can stop us!
chat.dream.3.0.3: Try bringing some glowing contraptions!... if you need to that is.
chat.dream.3.name: Dream World Day 3 Intro
chat.dream.6.0.0: Ever tried playing Breakout in a dream?
chat.dream.6.0.1: Sounds like a dream, doesn't it?
chat.dream.6.0.2: But instead of hitting bricks, it's zombies!
chat.dream.6.0.3: And instead of steel balls, it's Occult Balls!
chat.dream.6.0.4: And instead of ME, it's YOU!
chat.dream.6.name: Dream World Day 6 Intro
chat.dream.7.0.0: Doremy just fainted, it's nothing serious.
chat.dream.7.0.1: However, she does seem to be under some sort of curse. I'm still figuring out the details.
chat.dream.7.0.2: There also seems to be something slowly draining her life away, her situation is rather bleak.
chat.dream.7.0.3: In any case, we can ask her when she wakes up.
chat.dream.7.name: Dream World Day 7 Intro
chat.dream.8.0.3: Nightmare... it put a curse on me...
chat.dream.8.0.4: Soon, I will... lose all my strength...
chat.dream.8.0.7: Is there... really nothing we can do?
chat.dream.8.name: Dream World Day 8 Intro
chat.dream.9.0.0: I've done all I can to draw Nightmare to us, you should be careful.
chat.dream.9.0.1: I know. Let's just get this over with.
chat.dream.9.0.2: <color=blue>(...I said I'd defeat Nightmare, but I don't have any confidence at all.)</color>
chat.dream.9.0.3: <color=blue>(But for Miss Doremy, this is what I have to do...)</color>
chat.dream.9.0.4: The rest is up to you... but, don't put your life in danger, okay?
chat.dream.9.0.5: Wait, what's that white spider over there?
chat.dream.9.name: Dream World Day 9 Intro
chat.dream_map.1.0.0: Great, more physical bodies... there's even a blocky big-nosed weirdo.
chat.dream_map.1.0.1: She's definitely not talking about me!
chat.dream_map.1.0.2: How did you get here with physical bodies? Don't tell me... you're heading for the Lunar Capital?
chat.dream_map.1.0.3: Lunar Capital? No, we're heading for Gensokyo!
chat.dream_map.1.0.5: Look around, aren't there a lot of zombies and other monsters here?
chat.dream_map.1.0.6: Well, that's true... but what does that have to do with you?
chat.dream_map.1.0.7: Obviously we're here to get rid of them!
chat.dream_map.1.name: Dream World Day 1 Map
chat.dream_map.10.0.1: Yes. Are you sure you want to do this?
chat.dream_map.10.0.2: I'll say it again. If you succeed, it all works out.
chat.dream_map.10.0.3: But if you fail, it'll cost more than just one life.
chat.dream_map.10.0.4: There's no other way. I have to do this.
chat.dream_map.10.0.5: Doremy's life is on the ropes.
chat.dream_map.10.0.6: Miss Doremy... she doesn't want me to fight it.
chat.dream_map.10.0.7: But for her sake, this is what I must do.
chat.dream_map.10.0.8: I'm really sorry... but I can't see Doremy right now.
chat.dream_map.10.0.9: ...Good luck. I'm sure Doremy would say the same.
chat.dream_map.10.name: Dream World Day 10 Map
chat.dream_map.11.0.0: I apologize for being reckless, Miss Doremy.
chat.dream_map.11.0.1: No no no. Don't apologize. You saved the Dream World after all.
chat.dream_map.11.0.11: I did some digging. Apparently, it's a grave you saw when you were young.
chat.dream_map.11.0.12: I would've told you sooner, but I got caught up in that Nightmare business. Now I'll tell you.
chat.dream_map.11.0.13: When I was young...? But I don't remember seeing any graves near Dave's house.
chat.dream_map.11.0.14: It was a long time ago. When you were just a baby.
chat.dream_map.11.0.16: <color=blue>(My childhood memories... they stop at when I was two or three years old.)</color>
chat.dream_map.11.0.17: <color=blue>(I had no parents. Only Dave raised me as an adoptive father.)</color>
chat.dream_map.11.0.18: <color=blue>(But I'm not a blocky creature like Dave, so I'm often treated as an outcast.)</color>
chat.dream_map.11.0.19: <color=blue>(I wonder... who my biological parents are.)</color>
chat.dream_map.11.0.2: You're such a worrisome child, you know? I don't dislike it though.
chat.dream_map.11.0.23: Your memory seems to stop here. You can't even remember what that person looks like.
chat.dream_map.11.0.24: All I can say is, it's a pity.
chat.dream_map.11.0.25: ...Is that so? But still, thank you, Miss Doremy.
chat.dream_map.11.0.26: Actually, I'm an orphan. Dave is the one who's been looking after me
chat.dream_map.11.0.27: All these years, I've always wondered who my biological parents really are.
chat.dream_map.11.0.28: I see. Well, we'll probably see each other again.
chat.dream_map.11.0.29: If you ever see me while dreaming, feel free to say hi.
chat.dream_map.11.0.3: <color=blue>(... She's treating me like a child...)</color>
chat.dream_map.11.0.30: And while you're in Gensokyo, I'll continue looking into your dreams.
chat.dream_map.11.0.31: <color=blue>(...Please don't look at my embarassing memories!)</color>
chat.dream_map.11.0.32: Alright, we can finally go to Gensokyo.
chat.dream_map.11.0.4: Oh yes, there's something I have to tell you.
chat.dream_map.11.0.7: Don't make fun of me behind my back!
chat.dream_map.11.0.9: Do you still remember that grave I told you about?
chat.dream_map.11.name: Dream World Day 11 Map
chat.dream_map.2.0.0: Wiping out all those spiders in one go, looks like you know what you're doing.
chat.dream_map.2.0.1: Oh right, I don't think I've introduced myself yet.
chat.dream_map.2.0.11: Steve and Villager, right? Welcome to the Dream World.
chat.dream_map.2.0.2: I'm Doremy Sweet, administrator of the Dream World... but you probably know that already, among other things.
chat.dream_map.2.0.3: Of course! This place was our goal from the start!
chat.dream_map.2.0.4: Oh, my name's Crazy Villager, but you can call me Villager! This is my neighbor, he's called...
chat.dream_map.2.0.5: Steve, right? I've heard his name before.
chat.dream_map.2.0.6: Someone in Gensokyo dreamt about you. You look exactly like the person in the dream.
chat.dream_map.2.0.7: Wow, you have a girlfriend in Gensokyo?! Which youkai is it?
chat.dream_map.2.0.8: I don't! Why would you think that?!
chat.dream_map.2.0.9: Woah! You can talk?! I thought you were mute!
chat.dream_map.2.name: Dream World Day 2 Map
chat.dream_map.3.0.0: By the way, Doremy, how's the situation in Gensokyo?
chat.dream_map.3.0.1: Well, the situation has more or less calmed down.
chat.dream_map.3.0.2: But, wasn't it invaded by blocky monsters? How can people stay calm despite the invasion?
chat.dream_map.3.0.3: Well, this is a big incident, but everyone's already used to it.
chat.dream_map.3.0.4: As for the monsters... they're only a threat to humans, since they don't have any way to defend themselves.
chat.dream_map.3.0.5: But the same can't be said for some powerful youkai. Instead, they prey on the pitiful monsters.
chat.dream_map.3.0.6: ...So, we don't need to do anything?
chat.dream_map.3.0.7: Not exactly. Their numbers are beyond count. Even after three years their numbers have only increased.
chat.dream_map.3.0.8: So, we need to find a way to get rid of them once and for all.
chat.dream_map.3.name: Dream World Day 3 Map
chat.dream_map.4.0.11: The grave next to a tree. It seems to keep appearing in your dreams.
chat.dream_map.4.0.12: Really...? I think I remember seeing one...
chat.dream_map.4.0.13: I don't know the details, but it must have made a lasting impact on you.
chat.dream_map.4.0.14: Having such strong memories of the deceased...  how pitiful.
chat.dream_map.4.0.15: <color=blue>(...Strange, I can't remember who the grave belongs to.)</color>
chat.dream_map.4.0.2: Ah, Steve. I'm looking at your dreams.
chat.dream_map.4.0.4: The records of all your previous dreams, I can access them from here.
chat.dream_map.4.0.5: D-don't tell me you were watching me cry for Trayarus to buy me mechanical toys when I was young———!
chat.dream_map.4.0.7: ...Although you were pretty cute at the time
chat.dream_map.4.0.9: What I'm curious about, is that grave in your dreams.
chat.dream_map.4.name: Dream World Day 4 Map
chat.dream_map.5.0.0: Hey, Doremy, there's something I want to ask.
chat.dream_map.5.0.10: But I have... never seen this occur even once!
chat.dream_map.5.0.11: Huh? You can't see the sky turning dark?
chat.dream_map.5.0.15: Doremy? What's wrong? Why are you-
chat.dream_map.5.0.16: I get it now, I thought everything was fine, but all along... my eyes have been deceived!
chat.dream_map.5.0.17: You two stay here, I need to look for something!
chat.dream_map.5.0.2: Do you know why the sky suddenly turns dark at times?
chat.dream_map.5.0.20: What... what's going on? This is the first time I've seen her like this...
chat.dream_map.5.0.4: Huh? You know, when the sky turns so dark during battles, you can't see anything?
chat.dream_map.5.0.5: I thought I went blind, but the darkness can be illuminated by light.
chat.dream_map.5.0.6: ...The sky turning dark? What are you talking about?
chat.dream_map.5.0.8: The sky has darkened several times already.
chat.dream_map.5.name: Dream World Day 5 Map
chat.dream_map.6.0.11: Wh-Why...has this place become like this?!
chat.dream_map.6.0.12: So this means, everything we had been seeing were just cover-ups?!
chat.dream_map.6.0.13: This place... has been like this all along?!
chat.dream_map.6.0.6: <color=blue>(The next moment, everything lost its color.)</color>
chat.dream_map.6.0.7: <color=blue>(Things dissolved and fell off, laughing viciously as they revealed their true form.)</color>
chat.dream_map.6.0.8: <color=blue>(It was a scene that I could never forget.)</color>
chat.dream_map.6.0.9: <color=blue>(This is... the 'nightmare' Doremy was talking about.)</color>
chat.dream_map.6.name: Dream World Day 6 Map
chat.dream_map.7.0.10: What did you see when you were cursed?
chat.dream_map.7.0.13: ...A horse. A black horse that came to the Dream World before you.
chat.dream_map.7.0.15:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
I found out about its existence.... a few months ago
chat.dream_map.7.0.16:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
It was just a horse at that time... it felt strange when I saw it, but I didn't mind that
chat.dream_map.7.0.17:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
I thought it was just another youkai... the next day, it disappeared
chat.dream_map.7.0.18:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
Now that I think about it, for it to deceive even me... it must be something extremely horrifying.
chat.dream_map.7.0.19:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
When you told me the dream suddenly turned dark, I realized that... things weren't so simple.
chat.dream_map.7.0.20:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
That's why I desperately looked for that thing...
chat.dream_map.7.0.21:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
In the end, I did find it, but it wasn't a horse anymore. It was... a monster.
chat.dream_map.7.0.23:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
Yes... after that I fell sick....
chat.dream_map.7.0.3: Yeah. How are you feeling, Doremy?
chat.dream_map.7.0.7: I can't... see anything... where are you?
chat.dream_map.7.0.9: Doremy, can you tell us what happened?
chat.dream_map.7.name: Dream World Day 7 Map
chat.dream_map.8.0.10: I'm just a failure of a guardian... I'm begging you... please go!
chat.dream_map.8.0.16: Wh-What are you trying to do?!
chat.dream_map.8.0.17: I am going to kill that demon.
chat.dream_map.8.0.20: St... Steve! Don't... be a fool!
chat.dream_map.8.0.22: Dave, you know what kind of person I am.
chat.dream_map.8.0.23: I won't forgive those who harm others, nor will I let anyone suffer alone.
chat.dream_map.8.0.24: Whether it's Nightmare or any other foe, I absolutely will not let it continue to do evil!
chat.dream_map.8.0.27: Alright, now lure that nightmare or whatever!
chat.dream_map.8.0.28: I'm going to teach it a lesson!
chat.dream_map.8.0.29: Understood... it's not like I can stop you anyway.
chat.dream_map.8.0.3: The Dream Crystal's healing effect... it's not enough!
chat.dream_map.8.0.30: Why... why aren't you two leaving......
chat.dream_map.8.0.4: Th-Then what are we supposed to do?!
chat.dream_map.8.0.5: Can we only watch as she... I won't allow that to happen!
chat.dream_map.8.0.8: Please..... leave while you still can.....! Don't mind me...... use that key and go!
chat.dream_map.8.0.9: If you stay here... very soon... you too will be...
chat.dream_map.8.name: Dream World Day 8 Map
chat.dream_map.9.0.0: Hey, Doremy wants to see you again.
chat.dream_map.9.0.1: She's still telling us to leave?
chat.dream_map.9.0.2: Yes. You haven't seen her for a while, right?
chat.dream_map.9.0.4: I can understand how you feel. Honestly, I don't plan to give up and leave either.
chat.dream_map.9.0.5: There's someone I need to see.
chat.dream_map.9.name: Dream World Day 9 Map
chat.dream_over.1.0.1: You can place non-aquatic contraptions on it!
chat.dream_over.1.0.2: In other words, you can set up your defenses on water now!
chat.dream_over.1.0.3: Too bad it can't smash boats like its ancestors!
chat.dream_over.1.0.4: Humans from the outside world, let me see what dreams you have...
chat.dream_over.1.name: Dream World Day 1 Outro
chat.dream_over.11.0.4: And... my life force is back!
chat.dream_over.11.0.7: Nicely done, neighbor! Now the nightmare in Dream World has been completely destroyed!
chat.dream_over.11.name: Dream World Day 11 Outro
chat.dream_over.2.0.1: It shoots arrows towards enemies like Dispensers!
chat.dream_over.2.0.2: But you can place another Drivenser on it to increase the number of arrows fired per shot!
chat.dream_over.2.0.3: The maximum is 5 arrows per shot!
chat.dream_over.2.0.4: If one can't solve the problem, use a pile!
chat.dream_over.2.name: Dream World Day 2 Outro
chat.dream_over.3.0.1: This is Gravity Pad, it can increase the gravity of objects above it!
chat.dream_over.3.0.2: Not only can it slow down enemies above, but it can also pull down projectiles to reach low height enemies!
chat.dream_over.3.0.3: Oh, but don't place them under apple trees...
chat.dream_over.3.name: Dream World Day 3 Outro
chat.dream_over.4.0.1: Vortex Hoppers must be placed on water, and will pull enemies underwater upon contact!
chat.dream_over.4.0.2: Turn all these zombies into Drowned!
chat.dream_over.4.name: Dream World Day 4 Outro
chat.dream_over.5.0.0: Hey, pal! You found an Ender Chest!
chat.dream_over.5.0.1: I've put lots of goods in my Ender Chest! You know what this means?
chat.dream_over.5.0.2: It means... Crazy Villager's Store is now officially open!
chat.dream_over.5.0.3: Come and buy something! Buy one get zero free!
chat.dream_over.5.name: Dream World Day 5 Outro
chat.dream_over.6.0.1: It can shoot spikes similar to arrows! And when encountering flying enemies, it will stretch itself to attack them!
chat.dream_over.6.0.2: A Pistenser a day keeps the Ghasts away!
chat.dream_over.6.name: Dream World Day 6 Outro
chat.dream_over.7.0.1: It can shoot darts that weaken enemies, making them unable to deal any damage!
chat.dream_over.7.0.2: It can also use fire breath to burn nearby enemies!
chat.dream_over.7.0.3: And at last, throw a deadly poison javelin!
chat.dream_over.7.name: Dream World Day 7 Outro
chat.dream_over.8.0.1: It's a barrier that can regenerate itself!
chat.dream_over.8.0.2: And can also be used to heal other lives!
chat.dream_over.8.0.3: We can heal Doremy with this!... maybe.
chat.dream_over.8.name: Dream World Day 8 Outro
chat.dream_over.9.0.1: This is Dream Silk! Place one on a contraption, and it'll fall asleep!
chat.dream_over.9.0.2: And generate a Starshard for you when it wakes up!
chat.dream_over.9.0.3: ...I'll try using it to relieve Doremy's pain.
chat.dream_over.9.name: Dream World Day 9 Outro
chat.halloween.1.0.2: We can't just take a bus there!
chat.halloween.1.0.3: And it seems like there are those zombies here too.
chat.halloween.1.0.4: I will kindly let you finish them all off!
chat.halloween.1.0.6: Our mine works on solar energy, and it's night.
chat.halloween.1.0.7: So there's no more energy for the energy generator to generate energy.
chat.halloween.1.0.8: Rely on your Furnaces to survive this night!
chat.halloween.1.name: Halloween Day 1 Intro
chat.halloween.11.0.0: Before we begin, here’s a hot tip for boss battles.
chat.halloween.11.0.1: ALWAYS try to look out for whatever swiggity swooty the boss guy can do!
chat.halloween.11.0.2: And some thingamabobs to COUNTER whatever that is. Ya get what I mean?
chat.halloween.11.0.3: Keep in mind that, choosing what contraptions to sacrifice, and what not to is crucial for this battle.
chat.halloween.11.0.4: From what I’ve seen, TNTs have the ability to absorb lightning and become high-pressured.
chat.halloween.11.0.5: Let’s make good use of that, neighbor!
chat.halloween.11.name: Halloween Day 11 Intro
chat.halloween.3.0.0: By the way, what are those statues?
chat.halloween.3.0.1: These statues... I heard they're called Gargoyles.
chat.halloween.3.0.2: I'm not so sure about its exact details. I need to read my Almanac.
chat.halloween.3.0.5: Looks like we aren't gonna learn what Gargoyles are today.
chat.halloween.3.name: Halloween Day 3 Intro
chat.halloween.4.0.1: I probably lost it while fighting those monsters.
chat.halloween.4.0.3: Don't worry... Perhaps those zombies will bring the Almanac back to us.
chat.halloween.4.0.4: Because... hmm... They seem to pick up... anything they encounter.
chat.halloween.4.0.5: Maybe one of them got a hold of my Almanac.
chat.halloween.4.0.6: Really? Time to hunt for... whoever got the Almanac!
chat.halloween.4.name: Halloween Day 4 Intro
chat.halloween.6.0.0: The key's gone, that's unfortunate. But put that aside and focus on today’s fight!
chat.halloween.6.0.1: The storm is raging, and the sky is dark!
chat.halloween.6.0.2: No zombies today, but don’t ignore the ghosts - they can be completely invisible!
chat.halloween.6.0.3: Never fear, we can still discover them by the light from lightning strikes!
chat.halloween.6.0.4: Take your sword into battle! But avoid attacking those innocent ghosts passing by, or they will punish you!
chat.halloween.6.0.5: Now, let’s hunt those who have fallen into darkness!
chat.halloween.6.name: Halloween Day 6 Intro
chat.halloween.8.0.0: We can’t be all just sitting here waiting for Frankenstein to come!
chat.halloween.8.0.1: Just the time I use some Lure Spells to find and attract the target!
chat.halloween.8.0.2: I'll use this bad boy right here! We should be able to find the target in about three days!
chat.halloween.8.name: Halloween Day 8 Intro
chat.halloween.9.0.0: Here... I think you should be warned.
chat.halloween.9.0.1: Some dead Necromancers have been buried beneath this graveyard.
chat.halloween.9.0.2: Though they are dead, their ability of necromancy still exists.
chat.halloween.9.0.3: If they are resurrected, try to find good counters against their witchcraft.
chat.halloween.9.name: Halloween Day 9 Intro
chat.halloween_final.0.0: The portal is ready, you can now continue your journey.
chat.halloween_final.0.1: Well then... I wish you all good luck.
chat.halloween_final.0.2: This is it, neighbor! Let's begin our journey to Gensokyo!
chat.halloween_final.name: Halloween Parting
chat.halloween_map.1.0.0: Wow! A wild witch has appeared!
chat.halloween_map.1.0.1: Ah? Looks like she's not really...
chat.halloween_map.1.0.2: Excuse me, who are you and how did you get here?
chat.halloween_map.1.0.3: We found a treasure map! So we're going wherever it tells us to go!
chat.halloween_map.1.0.5: Could you do me a favor?
chat.halloween_map.1.0.6: It's that... More zombies and undead start to appear recently. Could you help me... put them to rest?
chat.halloween_map.1.0.7: No problem! Leave it to me- MY PAL, STEVE!
chat.halloween_map.1.name: Halloween Day 1 Map
chat.halloween_map.11.0.0: Once again, my thanks to you.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.1: As promised, I will now teleport you to Gensokyo.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.10: Seems like our battle still has a long way to go!
chat.halloween_map.11.0.11: Right... I will now prepare the portal. Best of luck, both of you.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.2: Hey neighbor! We finally get to go there!
chat.halloween_map.11.0.3: However, there are two things you need to keep in mind.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.4: First, this key can only teleport you to the Dream World. If you wish to truly arrive in Gensokyo, you will have to look for a method to access the reality world.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.5: Second... Gensokyo is currently a big mess.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.7: As you can see here, a lot of monsters started to appear out of nowhere, and they all have this... weird blocky shape.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.8: These blocky monsters seem to have spread all the way to Gensokyo, so its reality world is now nothing but chaos.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.9: But if it's you guys, perhaps this problem could be resolved?
chat.halloween_map.11.name: Halloween Day 11 Map
chat.halloween_map.2.0.0: You do seem to... have excellent skills.
chat.halloween_map.2.0.1: Oh, it seems like I haven't properly introduced myself.
chat.halloween_map.2.0.2: I'm Orant, a soul sorceress, I'm here... waiting for someone to arrive.
chat.halloween_map.2.0.6: In our villages, we rely on Iron Golems to defend from those monsters!
chat.halloween_map.2.0.7: And you, should be the creator of the Iron Golem prototypes?
chat.halloween_map.2.0.9: But... I've long since abandoned those things.
chat.halloween_map.2.name: Halloween Day 2 Map
chat.halloween_map.3.0.1: A kind of glowing stone from the Nether... Extremely rare in the overworld.
chat.halloween_map.3.0.2: It... glows. But... what needs to be lit...?
chat.halloween_map.3.name: Halloween Day 3 Map
chat.halloween_map.4.0.0: Come to think of it, this swamp is really bizzare.
chat.halloween_map.4.0.1: We’ve stayed here for 4 days, but it's still Halloween’s eve!
chat.halloween_map.4.0.2: Ah, that's because this place has been witched.
chat.halloween_map.4.0.3: Or cursed... The time of this swamp will be Halloween’s eve forever.
chat.halloween_map.4.0.4: Just like a mysterious painting... where time stopped eternally.
chat.halloween_map.4.0.5: That’s a weird phenomenon and all, but it won’t get in our way.
chat.halloween_map.4.0.6: Well then, neighbor, keep on finding the Almanac!
chat.halloween_map.4.name: Halloween Day 4 Map
chat.halloween_map.5.0.0: Hm, speaking of which... Why did you guys follow that map all the way over here?
chat.halloween_map.5.0.10: That monster... was so strong that fleeing was my only choice. And the key was robbed at that time.
chat.halloween_map.5.0.2: We wanna go to another world called Gensokyo! We’ve been looking everywhere for a way to get there!
chat.halloween_map.5.0.3: Go to... another world... Right, I do have such a method for that.
chat.halloween_map.5.0.4: I have a magical key, it can open a portal to the Dream World, which connects to other worlds.
chat.halloween_map.5.0.5: Ooh, is that so? Then could you help send us there?
chat.halloween_map.5.0.6: Um... To be honest, there’s a problem.
chat.halloween_map.5.0.9: When I was on patrol nearby, I was attacked by a... monster.
chat.halloween_map.5.name: Halloween Day 5 Map
chat.halloween_map.6.0.0: So, what's the monster that attacked you?
chat.halloween_map.6.0.1: A giant, terrible and strong corpse monster, filled with enormous amount of electricity. It's called... Frankenstein.
chat.halloween_map.6.0.2: Frankenstein? But that's just some fictional stuff from a novel!
chat.halloween_map.6.0.3: I also thought it was... but it really does exist.
chat.halloween_map.6.0.4: Sorry for my negligence... the situation shouldn't have been like this.
chat.halloween_map.6.0.5: Never mind that, we just need to get the key back!
chat.halloween_map.6.0.6: ...If you wish to fight against the monster, please be careful...
chat.halloween_map.6.name: Halloween Day 6 Map
chat.halloween_map.7.0.0: So, that key, just what is it actually?
chat.halloween_map.7.0.1: That key is called the Dream Key.
chat.halloween_map.7.0.2: Using the Dream Key is one way to travel to other worlds. It allows you to enter the dream of a world.
chat.halloween_map.7.0.3: Then by finding a way to access the reality of the world from its dream, you can ultimately travel to different worlds
chat.halloween_map.7.0.4: Sounds like a cool thing to me!
chat.halloween_map.7.0.5: If we have it, we can definitely go to Gensokyo!
chat.halloween_map.7.name: Halloween Day 7 Map
chat.halloween_over.1.0.0: This is our old friend, Small Dispenser!
chat.halloween_over.1.0.1: Say hello to our little friend!
chat.halloween_over.1.0.2: Small Dispensers don't need ME to be placed. They can shoot short-ranged snowballs and are great contraptions for nighttime!
chat.halloween_over.1.name: Halloween Day 1 Outro
chat.halloween_over.11.0.0: This is my Dream Key! You did it!
chat.halloween_over.11.0.1: And with that, Frankenstein has also returned to the place where he belongs.
chat.halloween_over.11.0.2: I am truly grateful for all the things you have done for me thus far.
chat.halloween_over.11.0.3: No need to thank us, we just did what we had to do!
chat.halloween_over.11.name: Halloween Day 11 Outro
chat.halloween_over.2.0.1:
It can automatically produce ME under the moonlight or in darkness! 
And it increases its yield after a while!
chat.halloween_over.2.0.2: You should use it instead of Furnaces, for its low ME cost!
chat.halloween_over.2.name: Halloween Day 2 Outro
chat.halloween_over.3.0.0: This is Glowstone, it can light up an area around it and dispel fog!
chat.halloween_over.3.0.1: But... there's no fog in this place full of moonlight.
chat.halloween_over.3.name: Halloween Day 3 Outro
chat.halloween_over.4.0.1: It can knock enemies back a long distance! And heavily damage fragile stones or other objects!
chat.halloween_over.4.0.2: However, it will be broken after the punch, and need some time to repair itself!
chat.halloween_over.4.name: Halloween Day 4 Outro
chat.halloween_over.5.0.0: Aha! We finally found Orant's Almanac!
chat.halloween_over.5.0.2: Thank you... However, perhaps you need this more than I do.
chat.halloween_over.5.0.4: ...This Almanac will automatically record contraptions, enemies and other infomation you've come across- it is a really convenient tool.
chat.halloween_over.5.0.5: You two might make the most out of it.
chat.halloween_over.5.0.6: And to express my appreciation, please take it as a gift.
chat.halloween_over.5.0.7: Oh really? Sweet! Thanks a bunch!
chat.halloween_over.5.name: Halloween Day 5 Outro
chat.halloween_over.6.0.0: Happy birthday! Here’s your dangerous cake!
chat.halloween_over.6.0.1: This is TNT! After you trigger it, it will go KABOOM and blow up all the surrounding enemies!
chat.halloween_over.6.0.2: What? How do you trigger it?
chat.halloween_over.6.name: Halloween Day 6 Outro
chat.halloween_over.7.0.1: Behold, the Soul Furnace! It can shoot DEADLY soulfire balls and burn groups of enemies on hit!
chat.halloween_over.7.0.2: But at what cost? It needs the contraption in front of it sacrificed as its fuel!
chat.halloween_over.7.0.3: Let the enemies BURN IN HELL!
chat.halloween_over.7.name: Halloween Day 7 Outro
chat.halloween_over.8.0.0: The Perfect and Elegant Dispenser is here!
chat.halloween_over.8.0.1: Here comes Silvenser! Its knives can slice flesh and deal great damage! And pierce through anything that aren't hard!
chat.halloween_over.8.0.2: It's about time we show The World!
chat.halloween_over.8.name: Halloween Day 8 Outro
chat.halloween_over.9.0.0: Do you still remember the clown fairy from Hell?
chat.halloween_over.9.0.1: Magic Chest, or Magichest! It swallows an enemy in front of it, and then transforms itself into a Starshard!
chat.halloween_over.9.0.2: Who's up for a magic show?
chat.halloween_over.9.name: Halloween Day 9 Outro
chat.note_dream.0.1: Just a piece of waste paper.
chat.note_dream.0.2: It does seem to have words on it. Probably since we're in a dream, the words aren't clear.
chat.note_halloween.0.0: An invitation! From the zombies! To a party!
chat.note_halloween.0.1: That is... one heck of a handwriting.
chat.note_halloween.0.2: Hold on, shooting... and electric arcs? That's how Frankenstein attacks!
chat.note_halloween.0.3: Perhaps... you will be in for a tough fight.
chat.note_halloween.0.4: Neighbor, this is an opportunity we can’t miss!
chat.note_halloween.name: Halloween invitation
chat.note_prologue.0.0: This looks like a treasure map!
chat.note_prologue.0.1: What’s this portal at the end of the map?
chat.note_prologue.0.2: Maybe... it will lead us to some MAGICAL places!!!
chat.note_prologue.0.3: And we might even arrive at that Gensokyo world I’ve been telling you about!
chat.note_prologue.0.4: Y’know, a world with humans and youkai! And magical powers from various legends!
chat.note_prologue.0.5: CRAAZZYY, RIGHT??? We’re coming for ya, very-suspicious-looking portal!
chat.note_prologue.name: Treasure map?
chat.seventh_slot.0.0: Before we start, I'm sure that you’ll need a 7th contraption slot!
chat.seventh_slot.2.0: 750$ for the 7th slot, but... seems like you’re too broke...
chat.seventh_slot.2.1: Come back to this level when you have enough money!
chat.seventh_slot.4.0: What a shame! If you change your mind, come back to this level!
chat.seventh_slot.name: Slot deal
chat.starshard_tutorial.0.0: Hey, pal, let me share with you some MAGICAL things!
chat.starshard_tutorial.0.1: This is called the Starshard! It changes into a different item based on our location!
chat.starshard_tutorial.0.2: However, the effect is the same - Activating your contraptions' Evocation ability!
chat.starshard_tutorial.0.3: Alright, let's try Magic Candy - the Starshard of this area!
chat.starshard_tutorial.1.1: Oh boy! Looks like more guests need to be entertained!
chat.starshard_tutorial.name: Starshard Tutorial
chat.trigger_tutorial.0.0: Well, to start off, lemme teach you how to trigger contraptions!
chat.trigger_tutorial.name: Trigger Tutorial
chat.tutorial.0.0: Hey, neighbor, long time no see!
chat.tutorial.0.1: It's been a long time since I last saw you!
chat.tutorial.0.2: How is your experience with the contraptions now?
chat.tutorial.0.3: Have you forgotten everything? Would you like a recall?
chat.tutorial.3.0: Hey, neighbor! You're getting the hang of it!
chat.tutorial.3.1: I didn't say anything and yet you've already completed the tutorial!
chat.tutorial.4.0: Ah! Those zombies are coming after you again.
chat.tutorial.4.1: Neighbor, use your skills to defeat them!
chat.tutorial.name: Tutorial
contraption.anvil.description:
Health: <color=red>Medium-High</color>

Finally someone found my description!
contraption.anvil.description_header: Anvil crushes enemies below it and acts as a temporary barrier.
contraption.anvil.name: Anvil
contraption.anvil.tooltip: Fall from the sky to crush enemies, also a barrier
contraption.dispenser.description:
Damage: <color=red>Medium</color>

"People usually ask me how I can shoot an infinite amount of arrows, and without redstone." said Dispenser. "First, my fence is connected to a redstone pulse. Second, I am enchanted with Unbreaking III and Infinity. What? How can I talk?"
contraption.dispenser.description_evocat: Evocation: Rapidly shoot a large amount of arrows
contraption.dispenser.description_header: Dispensers are your first line of defense, they shoot arrows at incoming enemies.
contraption.dispenser.name: Dispenser
contraption.dream_crystal.description:
Toughness: <color=red>Medium-high</color>
Special: Regenerate health

"Hi, this is Villager from Gear Ear Mech Co, and I'll show you the super strong, zombie-proof crystal, that can instantly patch, bond, seal and repair! Dream Crystal is no ordinary crystal. Leaky contraptions can cause MAJOR DAMAGE, but Dream Crystal grips on tight and bonds instantly. Plus, Dream Crystal is so strong, it even works underwater! To show you the power of Dream Crystal, I SAWED THIS OBSIDIAN IN HALF, and repaired it with ONLY Dream Crystal!"
contraption.dream_crystal.description_ev: Evocation: Become invincible, regenerate health for surrounding contraptions
contraption.dream_crystal.description_he: Dream Crystals slowly regenerate their health.
contraption.dream_crystal.name: Dream Crystal
contraption.dream_silk.description:
Special: single use

Dream Silk is a sleepy guy. The first thing he does after waking up is sleeping. Look at him, even his recharge time is increased because of this.
contraption.dream_silk.description_heade: Dream Silk makes a contraption fall asleep. After it wakes up, a Starshard appear.
contraption.dream_silk.name: Dream Silk
contraption.dream_silk.tooltip: Make a contraption sleep, create a Starshard when it wakes up
contraption.drivenser.description:
Special: Can only be upgraded 4 times
Drivenser is a technical nerd. He knows how to assemble a computer, properties of different softwares and hardwares, different coding languages, etc. Recently he wants to compile a game to re-tell this war with the zombies, but someone's already ahead of him.
contraption.drivenser.description_header: Place another Drivenser on an existing one to increase the number of arrows per shot.
contraption.drivenser.name: Drivenser
contraption.drivenser.tooltip: Stackable, add arrows per shot after stacked
contraption.force_pad.description:
<color=red>Must be placed on Gravity Pad</color>
Usage: 
Up/Down: <color=red>Change objects' lanes.</color>
Front/Back: <color=red>Make projectiles turn back, or speed-boosted and have knockback effect.</color>

Contrary to what people think, Force Pad doesn't like forcing others to do things, he believes that everyone should follow their own will, and have the right to do whatever they want. But sometimes, he is forced to force some people to change their decision, and he can't do anything about it.
contraption.force_pad.description_evocat: Evocation: Move nearby enemies to a certain spot.
contraption.force_pad.description_header: The direction of Force Pads can be changed by triggering. Take advantage of this to change the movement of medium height objects above it, and boost projectiles.
contraption.force_pad.name: Force Pad
contraption.force_pad.tooltip:
(Requires Gravity Pad)
Change the force of objects above it
contraption.furnace.description:
ME production: <color=red>Medium</color>

Someone was so lazy that they installed a dropper attached to the mine under it. Oh and that mine uses geothermal energy.
contraption.furnace.description_evocatio: Evocation: Rapidly generate a large amount of redstone
contraption.furnace.description_header: Furnaces are essential for you to generate extra redstone which can be converted to ME. Try placing as many as you can!
contraption.furnace.name: Furnace
contraption.glowstone.description: And God said: Let there be light, and there were torches. And God said: Let there be solid light, and there were Glowstones. And God said: Let there be controllable solid light, and there was Redstone Light. God said: Ok that's enough
contraption.glowstone.description_header: The light of Glowstones can clear fog, reveal ghosts and prevent contraptions from rebelling.
contraption.glowstone.name: Glowstone
contraption.glowstone.tooltip: Light an area, clear fog and reveal ghosts
contraption.gravity_pad.description:
Special: Cannot be eaten by enemies

Once upon a time, Gravity Block was sitting under an apple tree, when all of a sudden an apple fell on its head, smashing it flat - it was a Golden Apple.
contraption.gravity_pad.description_evoc: Evocation: Anvil falls from the sky, crushes enemies and stops them
contraption.gravity_pad.description_head: Gravity Pads can lower the height of medium height objects above it, and make enemies on it have reduced speed and unable to climb or jump.
contraption.gravity_pad.name: Gravity Pad
contraption.gravity_pad.tooltip: Increase the gravity of objects above it
contraption.infectenser.description:
Damage: <color=red>Medium</color>
<color=red>Must be placed on Small Dispenser</color>
<color=blue>Can only be used at night</color>

Infectenser has won the Disbel Prize in virology, but due to the epidemic situation, the award ceremony couldn't be held.
contraption.infectenser.description_evoc: Evocation: Make all parasitizing parabots self-destruct.
contraption.infectenser.description_head: Infectenser can shoot short-ranged parabots which both deal damage and parasitize enemies. Parasitized enemies will shoot new parabots to other enemies around them.
contraption.infectenser.name: Infectenser
contraption.infectenser.tooltip:
(Requires Small Dispenser)
Shoot parabots which spread between enemies
contraption.lily_pad.description:
<color=blue>Must be placed in water</color>

"Why are you making me a gift for Sakuya?! I am NOT a lily chest pad!"
contraption.lily_pad.description_evocati: Evocation: Summon four copies in four directions
contraption.lily_pad.description_header: Lily Pads allow you to place non-aquatic contraptions on water.
contraption.lily_pad.name: Lily Pad
contraption.lily_pad.tooltip: Allow you to place contraptions on water
contraption.magichest.description: Clownpiece was obssessed with America after seeing the USA flag on the Moon, and Magichest was obssessed with it after seeing Clownpiece. Now he's all down the streets protesting and shouting "AMERICA F*#K YEAH" and no one can stop him.
contraption.magichest.description_evocat: Evocation: Summon a Ghast. Also try Nether Blame!
contraption.magichest.description_header: Magichests transform into a Starshard after swallowing an enemy whole.
contraption.magichest.name: Magichest
contraption.magichest.tooltip: Swallow an enemy, then transform into a Starshard
contraption.mine_tnt.description:
Damage: <color=red>Extremely high</color>

Why do Mine TNTs need time to arm themselves? It has been an enigma for years. What can go wrong if he can be instantly armed? It's a normal thing for him however. He was asleep.
contraption.mine_tnt.description_evocati: Evocation: Instantly arm itself, then place two copies of itself on the rightmost column.
contraption.mine_tnt.description_header: Mine TNTs cause a great deal of damage, but they need a while to arm themselves.
contraption.mine_tnt.name: Mine TNT
contraption.mine_tnt.tooltip: Explode on contact, but take time to arm itself
contraption.moonlight_sensor.description:
ME production: <color=red>Low</color>, then <color=red>Medium</color>
<color=blue>Can only be used at night</color>

Maybe you're asking why it isn't a Daylight Sensor. It moonlights as a Moonlight Sensor, and it loves the job so much.
Evocation: Instantly upgrade, glow with blue light and increase its yield by 2.5 times.
Moonlight Sensors provide ME at night, and increase the yield after a while.
contraption.moonlight_sensor.name: Moonlight Sensor
contraption.moonlight_sensor.tooltip: Automatically provide ME, increase the yield after a while
contraption.obsidian.description:
Toughness: <color=red>High</color>

It is said that there's an Easter egg that can be found after forming the shape of a Nether portal with Obsidians and placing a Furnace in the middle. Would you like to try?


























Congratulations, you've been fooled
contraption.obsidian.description_evocati: Evocation: Restore health completely, gain Netherite Armor
contraption.obsidian.description_header: Obsidians are hard materials which you can use to prevent monsters from advancing and protect your other contraptions.
contraption.obsidian.name: Obsidian
contraption.pistenser.description:
Special: Can attack enemies on air

"It's over zombies, I have the high ground!" Those were his last words before a Ghast burns his leg- uhh, neck off.
contraption.pistenser.description_evocat: Evocation: Shoot seeds of giant armor-piercing spikes at up to 10 enemies
contraption.pistenser.description_header: Pistensers can stretch themselves to attack enemies in the air.
contraption.pistenser.name: Pistenser
contraption.pistenser.tooltip: Stretch itself to attack enemies in the air.
contraption.punchton.description:
Damage: <color=red>Very high</color>, and <color=red>ignore armors</color>

Punchton the piston, or One Punch Piston, punched a punch using a punch of tons.
contraption.punchton.description_evocati: Evocation: Extend piston arm and knock back all enemies in front
contraption.punchton.description_header: Punchtons can knock back enemies, and crush hard objects.
contraption.punchton.name: Punchton
contraption.punchton.tooltip: Knock back enemies and crush hard objects
contraption.random_china.name: Random China
contraption.random_china.tooltip: Spawn a random contraption upon destroyed
contraption.silvenser.description:
Damage: <color=red>Low-medium</color>, <color=red>Medium-high</color> against flesh
Special: Projectiles deal more damage to specific enemy types, but are blocked by hard objects

"DiDi, I've learned something... The more arrows you shoot, the more unexpected events come along. As long as you cannot go beyond your arrows...""What? What do you mean?!""I reject my arrows, DiDi!"
contraption.silvenser.description_evocat: Evocation: Create circles of knives with at most 10 enemies as the centers, knives start flying after a few seconds.
contraption.silvenser.description_header: Silvensers shoot piercing knives which can slice the flesh but are blocked by hard objects.
contraption.silvenser.name: Silvenser
contraption.silvenser.tooltip: Shoot knives which slice the flesh and pierce enemies
contraption.small_dispenser.description:
Damage: <color=red>Medium</color>
<color=blue>Can only be used at night</color>

There are rocks in the snowballs, stop asking.
contraption.small_dispenser.description_: Evocation: Shoot a snowball that gets bigger and bigger
Small Dispensers can shoot short-ranged snowballs.
contraption.small_dispenser.name: Small Dispenser
contraption.soul_furnace.description:
Damage: <color=red>High</color>
Special: Need to be fueled by burning other contraptions
<color=blue>Can only be used at night</color>

What is it burning inside the Soul Furnace? Sinners' soul? Slags of Hell? Don't think too much. It's just an ordinary jack o' lantern.
contraption.soul_furnace.description_evo: Evocation: Consume all the remaining fuel to rapidly shoot soulfire balls towards random enemies.
contraption.soul_furnace.description_hea: Soul Furances shoot terrifying soulfires, but will burn the contraption in front as its fuel.
contraption.soul_furnace.name: Soul Furance
contraption.soul_furnace.tooltip: Shoot strong soulfires, but burn the contraption in front
contraption.tnt.description:
Damage: <color=red>Extremely high</color>

TNT needs gunpowder to be crafted. But in reality the TNT and gunpowder have nothing to do with each other. Why? Nobody knows.
contraption.tnt.description_evocation: Evocation: Blast into 4 flying copies of itself that explode on impact
contraption.tnt.description_header: TNTs deal huge damage to surrounding enemies after being triggered.
contraption.tnt.name: TNT
contraption.tnt.tooltip: Blow up surrounding enemies after being triggered
contraption.totenser.description:
Special: Poison on its dart decrease enemies' damage

What god does Totenser believe in? According to the history of Contraption Intelligence, it might believe in various mechanical gods. Some say that it actually believes in the human inventor who built machinery, and others even say that it believes in the ancient mechanical gods. People's discussion went on for decades, but the truth is, it just put its faith in its waifus.
contraption.totenser.description_evocati: Evocation: Throw a spear which pierces through enemies, and leave a trail of weakening gas
contraption.totenser.description_header: Totensers shoot poisonous darts and burn nearby enemies with fire.
contraption.totenser.name: Totenser
contraption.totenser.tooltip: Shoot weakening darts and burn nearby enemies
contraption.vortex_hopper.description:
<color=blue>Must be placed in water</color>

As for his favorite pastime, he likes to spin himself as a spinning top while singing "KU-KURU KURU KURU KURU KURUUU".
contraption.vortex_hopper.description_ev: Evocation: Drag enemies in a wider range underwater
contraption.vortex_hopper.description_he: Vortex Hoppers drag all enemies close to it underwater when spinning.
contraption.vortex_hopper.name: Vortex Hopper
contraption.vortex_hopper.tooltip: Drag enemies close to it underwater
death_message.cave_spider: Here comes the itsy bitsy spider!
death_message.crushing_walls: <color=red>C O M E   T O   U S</color>
death_message.gargoyle: Job's done, back to vibing as a statue.
death_message.missing: You tell the creator, he forgot to set the death message.
death_message.necromancer:
You Died
 Death took 42690 gold and some XP away
death_message.parasite_terror: There are no healthy people left in the world...
death_message.zombie: I'm gonna eat your brains. We're the undead!
drop.redstone.name: Redstone
drop.starshard.name: Starshard
enemy.bone_wall.name: Bone Wall
enemy.capped_zombie.description: As time goes by, leather caps have gradually faded out of people's sights. But there are still some zombies holding onto their leather caps. When asked why, they always say, "No leather caps no pp"
enemy.capped_zombie.description_header:
Leather Cap Zombies have leather cap armors that resist damage.

Toughness: <color=red>Medium</color>
enemy.capped_zombie.name: Leather Cap Zombie
enemy.cave_spider.description: It has won the "Spidernet Surfing Competition" many times, just because the other spiders can't swim.
enemy.cave_spider.description_header:
Cave Spiders cannot climb over contraptions, but they can swim and crawl under most attacks.

Toughness: <color=red>Very low</color>
Speed: <color=red>Fast</color>
Special: <color=red>Will not be hit by medium height projectiles or higher</color>
enemy.cave_spider.name: Cave Spider
enemy.flag_zombie.description: When he was awarded the flag, he felt extremely honored and proud. He felt as if he was the leader of the zombies, he had the supreme position, and he fluttered all the time. However, he didn't know how many zombies behind were laughing at him as a meatshield.
enemy.flag_zombie.description_header:
The appearance of flag-holding zombies marks the arrival of a large wave of zombies.

Toughness: <color=red>Low</color>
enemy.flag_zombie.name: Flag Zombie
enemy.gargoyle.description: These guys usually stay silent as statues all the time, but they're actually just saving up their energy for another stormy night - which is when they party.
enemy.gargoyle.description_header:
Gargoyles will be revived from statues when the final wave comes.

Toughness: <color=red>Medium-high</color>

Weakness: <color=red>Punchtons</color>
enemy.gargoyle.name: Gargoyle
enemy.ghast.description:
########ANNOUNCEMENT########
· Local Hell Creature Exhibition Hall contains various types of hell creatures, including ghasts, zombified piglins (out of stock), wither skeletons, etc.
· Touching hell creatures is prohibited by all means
· No photography
· Do not feed diamond helmets to ghasts
enemy.ghast.description_header:
Ghasts can fly in the sky and bombard your contraptions.

Toughness: <color=red>Low</color>
Special: <color=red>Will not be hit by medium height projectiles or lower</color>
enemy.ghast.name: Ghast
enemy.ghost.description: When you walk at night and hear someone calling your name, don't look back, otherwise there'll be ghosts - and you'll scare them to death.
enemy.ghost.description_header:
Ghosts can reduce most taken damage in ethereal form.

Toughness: <color=red>Extremely high</color>, <color=red>Low</color> after being illuminated
Special: <color=red>reduces most taken damage in ethereal form</color>
Weakness: <color=red>Lose ethereality when illuminated</color>
enemy.ghost.name: Ghost
enemy.helmeted_zombie.description: From that helmet, one may assume he used to be a warrior in his lifetime, but it's not like that, he just has more IQ.
enemy.helmeted_zombie.description_header:
The iron helmet of the Iron Helmet Zombie provides him with extremely high protection.

Toughness: <color=red>High</color>
enemy.helmeted_zombie.name: Iron Helmet Zombie
enemy.mother_terror.description: Good at inserting bugs into network files.
enemy.mother_terror.description_header:
Mother Terrors lay their eggs into another enemy's body. They will also release Parasite Terrors if they die without laying eggs.

Toughness: <color=red>Medium</color>
Speed: <color=red>Fast</color>, then <color=red>Very slow (After laying eggs)</color>
Special: <color=red>flesh bodies will get parasitized upon contact</color>
enemy.mother_terror.name: Mother Terror
enemy.mummy.description: Just like everyone's mummy, mummies like perfumes. They're fanatic enough to carve the fragrance into the bones, putting people around them to death. These people died from mummies, so they're called... "Deaddies".
enemy.mummy.description_header:
Mummies will release gas after they die, which can heal the undead and damage contraptions.

Toughness: <color=red>Low-medium</color>
Weakness：<color=red>Fire can burn its gas</color>
enemy.mummy.name: Mummy
enemy.napstablook.name: Napstablook
enemy.necromancer.description: The Necromancers can’t figure out why they have to deal with others overtaxing them or calling them evil witches because they raise the dead. They just want to build a wall.
enemy.necromancer.description_header:
Necromancer can build temporary bone walls to block bullets.

Toughness: <color=red>Low</color>
Bone Wall Toughness: <color=red>Low-medium</color>
enemy.necromancer.name: Necromancer
enemy.parasite_terror.description: It hasn't figured out how to write its own network jokes.
enemy.parasite_terror.description_header:
Parasite Terrors shred the hosts' body and come out after they mature.

Toughness: <color=red>Extremely low - Very low (Variable)</color>
Speed: <color=red>Very fast</color>
enemy.parasite_terror.name: Parasite Terror
enemy.skeleton.description: Skeletons possess high archery accomplishments. People saw with their own eyes that one of them shot a sleeping wolf, it didn't die though, it WOKE.
enemy.skeleton.description_header:
Skeletons can shoot arrows at your rightmost contraption.

Toughness: <color=red>Low</color>
Arrow Damage: <color=red>Medium</color>
Special: <color=red>unable to shoot and ignore low height contraptions</color>
enemy.skeleton.name: Skeleton
enemy.spider.description: The Internet bars opened by Spiders are quite profitable, because everyone is stuck in the net.
enemy.spider.description_header:
Spiders can climb over your defenses.

Toughness: <color=red>Low</color>
Speed: <color=red>Fast</color>
Special: <color=red>Can climb over defensive contraptions</color>
enemy.spider.name: Spider
enemy.zombie.description: After the failure of the last Zombie War, the Zombie self-reflected in the corner for three days three nights. Later, he began to exercise himself, trying to be stronger to eat more brains. Now he looks... Well, he hasn't changed a bit.
enemy.zombie.description_header:
Zombies will run towards your house until they're defeated.

Toughness: <color=red>Low</color>
enemy.zombie.name: Zombie
error.failed_loading_level_error:
An error happened while loading the level.
Please submit the bug report to the author.
error.failed_loading_level_no_version_ta:
The version of save data is unknown.
Please restart the level.
misc.almanac.description:
The book is written in this book, and you are reading an entry in this book about the book itself described by this book.
When you look at the entry of the book in this book and feel dizzy, you feel dizzy reading the description by this book for the book in this book.
Time for you to revise your English.
misc.almanac.description_header: A magical almanac, once owned by Orant, will automatically record everything that you come across.
misc.almanac.name: Almanac
misc.blurred_note.name: Blurred Note
misc.dream_key.description:
A key filled with magic that is able to open a doorway to other worlds.
It can only be used to access the dreams of other worlds however. The reality of the corresponding world cannot be approached via its dream without permission from certain “administrators.”
There is an ancient inscription engraved on the key:
To fall asleep in the harsh reality
To the land of fantasy
To the end of the light
To the dream's awakening
misc.dream_key.description_header: A key used to open gates towards the dreamland of other worlds, allowing people to enter, held by Orant.
misc.dream_key.name: Dream Key
misc.dream_world.description:
The dreams of all creatures are interconnected, and the Dream World is where these dreams are located.
Doremy watches and manages the Dream World, as well as prevents anyone who attempts to use the Dream World to disrupt its order and interfere with the reality world.
After Steve and Villager came to the Dream World, it appeared in the shape of a pool lawn, which became their main battlefield.
misc.dream_world.description_header: Dream World is the world of everyone's dreams. It is administrated by Doremy.
misc.dream_world.name: Dream World
misc.eternal_night_swamp.description: Some contents of this entry will not be displayed due to the restrictions set by Orant.
misc.eternal_night_swamp.description_hea: Time has stopped on Halloween's eve in this cursed swamp, where Orant, the soul sorceress lives.
misc.eternal_night_swamp.name: Eternal Night Swamp
misc.frankenstein.description:
Special: <color=red>Lightning attacks always target TNTs; steel body deflect certain projectiles</color>
People around here are actually not too keen on novels. Whether Frankenstein is the name of the creator or the monster remains a mystery. As a result, both are called Frankenstein.
Some contents of this entry will not be displayed due to the restrictions set by Orant.
misc.frankenstein.description_header: A monster made up of corpses, famously known to be responsible for a number of death cases in science fiction.
misc.frankenstein.name: Frankenstein
misc.gargoyle_statue.description: The curse of Eternal Night Swamp doesn't only freeze the time of the midnight sky. It also shapes the stones underground into statues, and make them rise from the ground. Once the enchanted lightning strikes these statues, they will be given life and become living creatures.
misc.gargoyle_statue.description_header: Gargoyle Statues will become Gargoyles at the final wave.
misc.gargoyle_statue.name: Gargoyle Statue
misc.grave_in_dream.description:
Steve had no parents from the very start of his life. He was unknowingly transferred to the village and was raised by Dave.
Steve was not a blocky creature like the Villager, so he was often discriminated against and ridiculed, while wanting to know who his parents were.
It seems that this mystery will be solved in this adventure.
misc.grave_in_dream.description_header: Doremy mentioned that Steve had seen a grave in his dream when he was very young.
misc.grave_in_dream.name: Grave in Dream
misc.minecart.description:
There was a time when Minecarts with Furnaces were a thing.
Only the cool kids will remember this.
misc.minecart.description_header: Steve’s House’s last line of defense. It will crush all enemies in the lane when they get too close to the house.
misc.minecart.name: Minecart
misc.miner.description:
Steve is good at mechanics, and this miner is built by him. With the help of solar energy, it can automatically find the underground deposits of redstone ore, and then transport it to the surface for ME.
...But since it needs solar energy, why not directly turn solar energy into ME?
misc.miner.description_header: Steve's automated miner, which automatically digs for redstone during the day.
misc.miner.name: Miner
misc.napstablook.description_header: Napstablook will get ANGERY when you hit it with your sword, paralyzing the sword for a short while.
misc.napstablook.name: Napstablook
misc.nightmare_boss.description:
Nightmares are the residues abandoned by the old gods born from the void. They float in groups in the deep universe, tempted by fear, devouring and corrupting everything they encounter. They are monsters that are neither welcomed by the old gods nor accepted by life.
There are thousands of Nightmares in the universe. Only this one smelled the traces of fear in the Dream World and landed there. In order to protect its weak body in its early development stage, it disguised as a horse to deceive the dream manager, and then began to corrupt the whole dream without anyone knowing, taking the whole Dream World as its own.
As the residue of old gods, its power cannot be underestimated. Human beings with fragile minds cannot perceive its disturbing and unspeakable appearance. In order to protect their minds, they will normally perceive it as something they can accept, but still has a frightening appearance.
misc.nightmare_boss.description_header: Nightmare is a terrible monster that is able to deceive senses and corrosion, with countless incarnations.
misc.nightmare_boss.name: Nightmare
misc.nightmare_box.description: The Nightmare Box no longer contains any harmful magic. All it can do now is projecting the Nightmare World's image.
misc.nightmare_box.description_header: The Nightmare Box is a container made by collecting dark magic from Nightmare, and can turn the Dream World into Nightmare World.
misc.nightmare_box.name: Nightmare Box
misc.nightmare_world.description:
Doremy had seen a black horse in the Dream World a few months ago, which was Nightmare in disguise. Nightmare then began its corruption, and deceived everyone in the Dream World until it cursed Doremy.
What you now see is the true appearance of the Dream World.
misc.nightmare_world.description_header: Nightmare World is the Dream World corrupted by Nightmare.
misc.nightmare_world.name: Nightmare World
misc.nyaightmare.description_header: Nyaightmares will pierce anyone it hates to death.
misc.nyaightmare.name: Nyaightmare
misc.nyan_cat.description_header: Nyan Cats are soooo cute that they make any enemy touching it die.
misc.nyan_cat.name: Nyan Cat
misc.pumpkin_carriage.description: The eternal flame inside the pumpkins cannot be extinguished by water, blown away by wind or affected by chemical reactions. But some people just can't sleep with it - it shines so bright and you literally can’t turn this thing off.
misc.pumpkin_carriage.description_header: The last line of defense in the Swamp. It emits a green glow, and will crush all enemies in its lane when they get too close to the house.
misc.pumpkin_carriage.name: Pumpkin Carriage
misc.starshard.lucid_dream.description:
Records left by an anonymous person.

Star Record 2:
I had a very strange dream.
I dreamed that I was floating and sinking in a purple space full of eyes. I saw a girl with blonde hair sitting in the air with a pink parasol.
She seemed to be busy with her own business and didn't notice me. Then I fell into a bottomless abyss.
I opened my eyes and found myself in a plain field, surrounded by trees with pink flowers.
misc.starshard.lucid_dream.description_h: Starshards can evoke your contraptions, and make your contraptions burst with superpower.
misc.starshard.lucid_dream.name: Starshard: Lucid Dream
misc.starshard.magic_candy.description:
Records left by an anonymous person.
Star Record 1:
Since then, whenever I slept, I would've always dreamed of an object in an unfathomable darkness. It shone in the shape of a star, and then went away.
I didn't understand what it meant. Later, even when I wasn't dreaming, I could still often see similar objects, which was very abnormal.
When I left the land I don't belong to, I saw a rainbow-colored candy in a swamp. It was very similar to those stars, but I was still not sure what it was.
misc.starshard.magic_candy.description_h: Starshards can evoke your contraptions, and make your contraptions burst with superpower.
misc.starshard.magic_candy.name: Starshard: Magic Candy
misc.steves_house.description: Crazy Villager's village has previously been ruined by a raid from zombies, so they moved to a wide plain near the road, and started a new life.
misc.steves_house.description_header: Steve and Crazy Villager live here.
misc.steves_house.name: Steve's House
music.choosing.name: Choose Your Seeds
music.day.name: Grasswalk
music.dream_level.name: Fractured Fairytales Level
music.dream_map.name: Fractured Fairytales Map
music.halloween.name: Lexonomicon Level
music.halloween_boss.name: Lexonomicon Boss
music.halloween_map.name: Lexonomicon Map
music.mainmenu.name: Crazy Dave
music.minigame.name: Loon Boon
music.nightmare_map.name: Crimson
music.none.name: None
music.ultimate_battle.name: Ultimate Battle
store.confirm_purchase: Are you sure you want to purchase this for ${0:N0}?
store.crazy_villager.chat.1: I eat things off the floor!
store.crazy_villager.chat.2: A hanged man brings you luck today!
store.crazy_villager.chat.3: You have no idea how much Dirt Blocks sell on this side of the sea!
store.crazy_villager.chat.5: Buying multiple blueprints at once will cause something terrible! I'm lying!
store.crazy_villager.mvz2.card_slots: Extra blueprint slot! Allowing you to carry one more contraption to battle!
store.crazy_villager.mvz2.force_pad: Place Force Pads on your Gravity Pads. They can control the motion of objects above them!
store.crazy_villager.mvz2.infectenser: Place Infectensers on your Small Dispensers. Projectiles shot by them can spread between enemies!
store.crazy_villager.mvz2.starshard_slot: More Starshard slots! Let your contraptions evoke more!
store.insufficent_money: You don't have enough money! Come back when you're a little mmmm... richer!
ui.cancel_username: Username must be set when starting the game for the first time
ui.chapter_cleared:
You cleared this chapter.
The next chapter is in development and will be released soon.
Or...You may try the Endless Mode!
ui.confirm_back:
Are you sure to quit?
Your progress will be saved.
ui.confirm_delete:
Delete User?
This user's data will be all deleted!
ui.confirm_quit.0:
Quit?
I won't miss you! Really!
ui.confirm_quit.1:
Quit?
Only 1% can actually quit the game!
ui.confirm_quit.2:
Quit?
The inn will always be closed!
ui.confirm_quit.3:
Quit?
Dokutah, it's not the time to rest.
ui.confirm_quit.5:
Quit?
And donate to Reimu so she can achieve the EPIC YOKI GENOCIDE.
ui.confirm_quit.6:
Quit?
Exiting will cause the game to stop!
ui.confirm_tutorial: Do you want to have a tutorial?
ui.continue_level: Do you want to continue with the latest progress?
ui.duplicate_username: The username already exists, Reno is still glowing green.

Please play in the later versions.
